New Records: Virat Kohli set a new record with another half-century.
Rohit Sharma achieved the sixes record for India.
Key Match Events: Arshdeep Singh took two wickets in a single over.
Bhuvneshwar Kumar picked his second wicket, dismissing Netherlands captain Scott Edwards.
Mohammed Shami took a wicket, dismissing Tim Pringle.
Ravichandran Ashwin dismissed Colin Ackermann and Tom Cooper in the same over.
Axar Patel dismissed Bas de Leede and Max O'Dowd.
Virat Kohli scored an unbeaten 62 off 44 balls.
KL Rahul was dismissed for 9 off 12 balls by Paul van Meekeren.
Pre-Game Insights: India opted to bat against Netherlands.
India made no changes to the XI that beat Pakistan.
Scott Edwards, Netherlands' skipper, found it surreal to face India at the SCG.
Miscellaneous Highlights: India moved to the top of Group 2 with this win.
The match was played at the SCG.
India's batting preparation included a double session for Rohit Sharma.
